General.Name: PunaMusta Media Oyj
General.Description: PunaMusta Media Oyj publishes newspapers and magazines in Finland. The company also offers various marketing solutions, including magazines and newspapers printing, advertising products and communication materials, the content production and design, brand management, and digital visibility, as well as digital display solutions; and operates radio stations. In addition, it engages in securities trading, and real estate leasing activities. The company was formerly known as Pohjois-Karjalan Kirjapaino Oyj and changed its name to PunaMusta Media Oyj in April 2019. PunaMusta Media Oyj was founded in 1874 and is based in Joensuu, Finland.

4.Name: Mr. Jari  Avellan M.Sc, M.Sc.
4.Title: VP of Visibility & Printing and Pres & CEO of PunaMusta Oy
